name: Jewel Collapse!
description:
Let's start your journey in Jewel Classic , the amazingly delicious puzzle adventure guaranteed to satisfy your game needs!

Jewel Classic takes you to a puzzle game of hundreds of levels and many exciting obstacles. It’s easy to play but challenging to be a master!


Main features of Jewel Classic puzzle game:

* Over 250 jewels levels, which will be more
* Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master with many quest puzzles
* Acres of luscious levels to complete and marvellous magic diamonds to collect.
* Collect jewel osco and frenzy bejeweled to advance along the diamonds track for special surprises!
* Helpful magical boosters to help with challenging levels
* Daily free bonus with spin feature, you can get: diamond, jewel, special gems ...


How to play Jewel Classic: Candy Mode
- Switch and crush 3 jewels or more sweet jewels
- Crush 4 jewels in a line to create jewel thunder
- Splash 5 jewels with T or L shape to create jewel mash
- Find 5 gems in a ultimate jewel to create color boosters
- Combine 2 special gem to make a big surprised yummy blast!
- Collect bejeweled contain gift time, double score

BOOSTERS (POWER-UPS)
- Jewel Genies: collect sweet jewels in a 9-cell region
- Jewel Line: get & crush all jewels on the column or row
- Jewel Time: add 5 seconds to the sugar puzzle
- Jewel Pop: get & jam all sweet jewels have same color
- Jewel Mania: use the spider to eat yummy food in adventure land
- Jewel Rush Time: double score you get in 10 seconds


Best Free Match 3 game on store. It is simple and fun, but also quite challenging. Hope you enjoy game.
